children.subject: You should email Dr. Levien about the situation. Check the webpage about the EECS minor for her email. She was able to process my application for the EECS minor and have it declared on CalCentral in just 1 day. So I have a feeling that your application might have gotten lost somehow. Good luck!

history.content: I emailed an application for declaring the EECS minor to the EECS Center for Student Affairs like 2-3 months ago. Since then, I have not heard back from anyone. Am I suppose to receive a confirmation email or follow up about my application? I am a rising senior and I am worried that I won't be able to officially declare the minor since there is a policy that you must declare the minor at least one semester before graduation.
history.subject: Declaring EECS Minor
